altTitles.en: Why Not Be Honest with Yourself
If I Cum in My Dream

description.en:
1. Sisplay  
Sister Akiko has her younger brother Ryou take her out for a walk, posing as her sister, but then he's having a very un-sisterlike reaction to her, that needs to be resolved.  
  
2. Mahou ga Tokeru made (Until the Magic Comes Off)  
Akiko's senpai keeps bugging her, so she lets Ryou play the role of her boyfriend… But later in the evening, the games gets real!  
  
3. Charm Point  
Yayoi asks her brother about her charm points and gets a unsatisfactory answer. The second try succeeds, though… More then succeeds!  
  
4. Sunao ni Naretara (Why Not Be Honest with Yourself)  
Kazuto's friends think, his sisters is a Tsundere, but the don't know her the way he does, in many way, right?  
  
5. Sispara  
Kyouko is giving her brother Shinichi a blowjob… In his sleep! His other sister Naoko is mad at Kyou… It was her turn, but she'll get her turn later!  
  
6. Ane to Shite (Having Sex with My Sister)  
  
7. Tatoeba Konna Shimai (For Example, These Sisters)  
Younger sister is hooked on her newest PSP games and her older sister Madoka devised an exiting concentration test: Can she play the game while she's having sex with her sister? She passes the test and gets a sexy reward.  
  
8. Yume de Iketara (If I Cum in My Dream)  
  
9. Incest  
Younger brother peeks at his parents, while they having a really good time. His sister gives him a practical demonstration what he saw.  
  
10-11. Anemono Shibutsu (Personal Property)  
  
12. Distortion Love
